title: BRIEF-India's Gujarat Pipavav Port Reports Rise In Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit
text:
BRIEF-India's Gujarat Pipavav Port Reports Rise In Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit

Stock Markets 11 minutes ago (Oct 30, 2019 14:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Gujarat Pipavav Port Reports Rise In Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit Oct 24 (Reuters) - Gujarat Pipavav Port Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 762.8 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS 625.9 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 1.99 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 1.71 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO

BRIEF-India's Gujarat Pipavav Port Reports Rise In Sept Qtr Consol Net Profit
